menu.title: Greek Salad
menu.description: Greek Salad is a refreshing Mediterranean dish, combining tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese with olive oil and oregano for a deliciously simple and vibrant experience. It's a classic choice for a light and flavorful salad.

menu.title: Lemon Desert
menu.description: Lemon Dessert is a delightful treat featuring the zesty brightness of lemons. With a perfect balance of tangy lemon flavor, sweetness, and a light, airy texture, it offers a refreshing and satisfying conclusion to any meal.

menu.title: Grilled Fish
menu.description: Grilled Fish is a savory delight that showcases the simplicity of perfectly cooked fish. Infused with smoky flavors from the grill, it delivers a deliciously tender and flaky texture, making it a wholesome and flavorful choice for seafood enthusiasts.

menu.title: Pasta
menu.description: Pasta, a timeless comfort food, brings together al dente noodles and a variety of savory sauces. Versatile and satisfying, it offers endless possibilities, from classic marinara to creamy Alfredo, making it a beloved culinary canvas for diverse and flavorful dishes.

menu.title: Bruschetta
menu.description: Oven-baked bruschetta stuffed with tomatos and herbs.
